title: Drawing, "Project for a chalice", 1915–20
inscribed: Right bottom corner: M / CIRCULAR IN FORM
description: Vertical rectangle. Arched shaft with hanging vine motifs. Scalloped knob with medallions [the descender of a p bisecting an X]; and: A; and: [Greek letter omega], as sketched beside it. Alternatives of details, especially the lowering of the cup, are sketched. Plan of a [blank] of the shaft. Bordering line signed as A.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Project for a chalice", 1915–20.Pencil, yellow watercolor, creamy paper. 1939-84-81-b.
